original_title: Baby Signing Time Vol. 2: Here I Go
overview: Baby Signing Time Volume 2 sets your baby's day to music as you learn signs through song for everyday events - washing up, getting dressed, going places, getting ready for bed, and more.
tagline: Baby Signing Time Volume 2 sets your baby's day to music as you learn signs through song for everyday events - washing up, getting dressed, going places, getting ready for bed, and more.
title: Baby Signing Time Vol. 2: Here I Go
